last_episode_to_air.name: Facing the Darkness...
last_episode_to_air.overview: Past and present come to a head as Alma decides to face the truth, however dark it may be, of what happened on that fateful night in the hotel.

name: Dark Desire
overview: Married Alma spends a fateful weekend away from home that ignites passion, ends in tragedy and leads her to question the truth about those close to her.

episodes.name: It's just sex
episodes.overview: A law professor overhears her husband in a suspicious phone conversation, and later visits her recently divorced friend, who drags her to a nightclub.

episodes.name: One last night of passion
episodes.overview: Alma tries to set boundaries with Darío, and later walks in on a scene that supports her suspicions about Leonardo. Zoe questions her sexual identity.

episodes.name: What common people call love
episodes.overview: When forensic evidence suggests Brenda had just met with a lover, the police focus their efforts on identifying him. Darío gets Alma to open up to him.

episodes.name: Love, that word
episodes.overview: Alma reveals her lover's name to Esteban, who pays him a visit. Darío finds an upsetting photo in his mom's room. Zoe tries to figure out who Animus is.

episodes.name: What do you know about Dario Guerra?
episodes.overview: At the hotel, Darío spies on the anniversary celebration. Esteban digs deeper into Daríos's background and finds a connection to an old murder case.

episodes.name: Are you missing the good old times?
episodes.overview: Esteban shows Alma a case file. Zoe follows a GPS signal in hopes of finding Animus. Security video footage reveals the last person who visited Brenda.

episodes.name: You messed with the wrong woman
episodes.overview: Flashbacks reveal the start of Lucinda's illness. To test a theory Esteban has, Alma follows his instructions and asks Darío to meet her at a motel.

episodes.name: The tell-tale heart
episodes.overview: Alma has second thoughts about leading Darío into Esteban's trap and starts to panic. Meanwhile, Leonardo begins to suspect his wife is cheating on him.

episodes.name: A wicked game of mirrors
episodes.overview: Leonardo orders an exhumation. A flashback reveals the rest that transpired between Esteban and Darío. Zoe receives a surprise visitor at school.

episodes.name: The beauty of a sudden death
episodes.overview: Zoe is taken on a mysterious outing. A clue at Darío's shop leads Alma to a horrifying realization. Esteban's review of the security videos pays off.

episodes.name: Nothing is what it seems
episodes.overview: Evidence found at the picnic site spurs Leonardo to hunt down Darío. Later, after begging Alma not to air their dirty laundry, he suffers a breakdown.

episodes.name: We've messed up so much
episodes.overview: Esteban asks Vallejo to steal police evidence. Leonardo makes an admission to his brother, and recalls his final meeting with Brenda at her home.

episodes.name: You were only an innocent victim
episodes.overview: A gruesome find is made. Esteban gets hold of Leonardo's phone records and shows them to Alma. Zoe detects Animus's phone signal and zeros in on it.

episodes.name: Two truths and one lie
episodes.overview: The police apprehend a suspect carrying the evidence bag from Brenda's case. Alma demands answers from Darío. Leonardo's medical test results come back.

episodes.name: We never talked about love
episodes.overview: Lucinda insists she's owed money. García reviews the security videos and gets suspicious. Leonardo reveals what happened the last time he saw Brenda.

episodes.name: Revelation 21:8... Fire is set upon his anger
episodes.overview: The man who stole the evidence related to Brenda's case tells García who hired him. Darío remembers where Esteban held him captive and returns there.

episodes.name: We kill what we love
episodes.overview: Zoe makes a confession to her mom. On the run, Leonardo calls Esteban for help. García obtains an audio recording from the last phone call Brenda made.

episodes.name: The answer was always there
episodes.overview: An unexpected encounter answers Alma's lingering questions about the past weeks. García receives forensic results from the textile factory explosion.

episodes.name: Eros and Psyche
episodes.overview: Esteban is released from prison. A mysterious woman named Lys joins Alma's support group. A letter in the mail brings shocking news about Darío.

episodes.name: You Can Never Escape Something Like This
episodes.overview: Alma decides to warn Julieta about Darío and ends up bumping into him. At her bachelorette party, Julieta receives an eerie text and a tragedy occurs.

episodes.name: No One Can Run From Themselves
episodes.overview: Detective Montaño takes the lead in Julieta's case. Zoe requests a favor of her friend at the morgue. Alma asks Lys about her connection to Darío.

episodes.name: The Other
episodes.overview: After having a conversation with Leonardo, Íñigo starts suspecting Darío. Then, crucial evidence found on the roof turns Darío into the prime suspect.

episodes.name: Walking on Hot Coals
episodes.overview: When Darío insists that someone is impersonating him, a distrustful Alma reaches out to Esteban to try to unearth his past and confirm her doubts.

episodes.name: You Were Always My Mirror
episodes.overview: Alma spots Darío's alleged doppelgänger. Julieta's cellphone is found. Worried about her mom, Zoe orchestrates an intervention with Leonardo and Mónica.

episodes.name: A Dangerous Cocktail
episodes.overview: Esteban and Montaño keep collaborating to crack the case. A video on Julieta's cellphone turns Alma into a suspect in the police investigation.

episodes.name: Don't Believe a Thing You Hear
episodes.overview: While Alma and Darío are on the run looking for Lucinda's suitcase, Esteban plants a microphone in Montaño's office and sets out to find them.

episodes.name: You've Become Your Own Worst Enemy
episodes.overview: Esteban resorts to an aggressive method to help Alma. A video taken on Darío's 18th birthday reveals a shocking truth about his relationship with Lys.

episodes.name: Everyone Reads Their Own Story
episodes.overview: Darío confronts Lys. Zoe goes to Mau's apartment to review Julieta's forensic report. Alma and Esteban focus on uncovering Lys' involvement in the case.

episodes.name: Who the #*%& Are You Really?
episodes.overview: Montaño interrogates Alma, Darío, Lys and Leonardo. Íñigo digs deeper into Lys and Alberto's past. Daríos alleged doppelgänger shows up at Alma's house.

episodes.name: The Twins
episodes.overview: A photograph found in Lucinda's suitcase takes the case in a different direction. New incriminating photos from the bachelorette party emerge.

episodes.name: A Perfect and Unbearable Triangle
episodes.overview: Montaño investigates the bank account in Andorra. Zoe and Karina reach a breaking point. Esteban comes face to face with the fake Darío.

episodes.name: It Was Always You
episodes.overview: Montaño confronts Lys with the piling evidence against her. Suspicious of Darío, Alma sneaks into his hotel room and comes to a chilling realization.

episodes.name: Facing the Darkness...
episodes.overview: Past and present come to a head as Alma decides to face the truth, however dark it may be, of what happened on that fateful night in the hotel.
